name: Gamejam: The Gamejam game
description:
Welcome to the Game Jam the Jam Game Game!
You have 1 minute to build an amazing team and create the perfect jam game!

Talk to people and learn their role, favorite genre and skill level.
Then you can HIRE or FIRE them!
A team with varied roles gets a higher score.
People with same favorite genre get a score bonus!  

Team building ends when you have 5 people or run out of time. Then it's time to see how many people love your game!

CONTROLS:

WASD = Move
Enter = Talk
← = Hire
→ = Fire
